name: Rambling with my friend
description:
A zen experience about two friends rambling up the mountain.

I was doing an internship at my buddy and soon to be producer Thomas Waterzooi, and wanted to learn how to use Adventure Creator.
So with his technical help I created this little experience for you my friends.
I hope you will like it. 

My cooz Lucid Green did the music and if you like great chill hop music, you should check his other tunes there:    Spotify     Bandcamp    Soundcloud

There is builds for MAC and LINUX as well but I haven't tested them, so feel free to tell me if it works in the comment, thanks !
